# Guard Tower
## Overview
**Guard Tower:** This independent 30-foot tall tower of hewn stone comes complete with a [[Guard Post|guard post]] on top. Note that the cost listed below does not include the soldiersâ€™ equipment.

*Components:* [[Guard Post|Guard post]]; *Size:* 0.5 stronghold spaces; *Cost*: 800 gp.

*Staff:* Guards (6); *Upkeep:* 36 gp per month.
